    All Classes and Interfaces

    Class
    Description
    ConsoleIO
    Uses the native Java Scanner, Files, and Paths utilities to implement the UserIO interface.
    DomainValidationException
    Custom exception thrown when a domain value object fails validation.
    DynamicDbInitializer
    DynamicDbInitializer is a custom Spring ApplicationContextInitializer that allows the user to input a dynamic path to an SQLite database at application startup.
    FrontendController
    Controller that forwards all non-API and non-static requests to the frontend's index.html.
    LastWateredDate
    Value object representing the date a plant was last watered.
    LastWateredDateConverter
    JPA attribute converter for mapping LastWateredDate value objects to Date database columns and vice versa.
    LeaflogApplication
    The entry point for the LeafLog application.
    MenuBuilder
    MenuBuilder is a utility class for building and displaying a CLI-based menu.
    Notes
    Value object representing optional notes about a plant.
    NotesConverter
    JPA attribute converter for mapping Notes value objects to String database columns and vice versa.
    Plant
    JPA entity representing a plant in the system.
    PlantController
    PlantController is a REST controller that manages HTTP requests related to Plant resources.
    PlantControllerAdvice
    Handles exceptions related to plant operations such as not found, invalid input, or repository errors.
    PlantControllerCLI
    PlantControllerCLI provides a command-line interface (CLI) for interacting with plant-related features of the application.
    PlantDto
    Data Transfer Object (DTO) for creating and handling Plant resources.
    PlantDto.Request
    Record representing the request body for creating or updating a plant.
    PlantException
    Base class for domain-specific exceptions related to Plant operations.
    PlantException.InvalidFrequency
    Thrown when the watering frequency input is not a valid integer or out of range.
    PlantException.InvalidInput
    Thrown when the input data (e.g., from a DTO) is null, incomplete, or malformed.
    PlantException.PlantAlreadyExists
    Thrown when a plant already exists with the same ID or unique field.
    PlantException.PlantNotFound
    Thrown when no plant with the specified ID exists in the system.
    PlantException.RepositoryError
    Thrown when an unexpected error occurs during repository interaction.
    PlantModelAssembler
    Assembler class that converts Plant domain objects into HATEOAS-compliant EntityModel representations.
    PlantName
    Value object representing the name of a plant.
    PlantNameConverter
    JPA attribute converter for mapping PlantName value objects to String database columns and vice versa.
    PlantRepository
    Repository interface for managing Plant entities.
    PlantService
    PlantService contains the core business logic for managing plants in the system.
    PlantSpecies
    Value object representing the species of a plant.
    PlantSpeciesConverter
    JPA attribute converter for mapping PlantSpecies value objects to String columns in the database and vice versa.
    UserIO
    UserIO is an interface that defines an abstraction for input/output operations in the application.
    WateringFrequencyConverter
    JPA attribute converter for mapping WateringFrequencyInDays value objects to Integer database columns and vice versa.
    WateringFrequencyInDays
    Value object representing how often a plant should be watered, in days.
    WebConfig
    Configuration class that customizes Spring MVC settings.
